channel.title: Tech on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on C'est la Z

item.title: Keeping Current Between Semesters
item.description: People say that one of the impossible problems for CS teachers is keeping current - they say the field is constantly changing, how can a teacher keep up with all the new things going on. Well, on the one hand it isn't true - most of the core of CS is the same. We still teach roughly the same programming constructs, data structures and algorithms. On the other hand, it is true.
